game_description: As an adventurer, you’ve been thrown into a remote island by a fierce storm. You must survive on and escape from it eventually. Build your skill set for living in the wild along the journey, no matter it is forking fishes, hunting with bows, farming, or making houses! Those will definitely help to realize your goal and build up the gears needed for your next challenge. Have great adventures to explore the 'dark forest' where you may need to fight against mystery malicious creatures and collect treasures as a reward. No one knows what risks you'll have to resolve till tomorrow… Join discord: https://discord.gg/qMkyDn4NEM We are a tiny indie VR game studio and it will be awesome to hear what you think about the game, good or bad. Looking forward to hearing from you all! Try out the Early-Access release version here: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/4825294284255836/ *Multiplay mode* is available for the early-access version NOW! Build and explore the islands with friends together!
review_1: Please add settings about what mobs you wan on the game please.. I have a fear of spiders the tame is cool and stuff but can you add where it could just be survival and no dangerous animals or less scary animals?
review_2: I really like this game and it’s really well made but the problem is I have stick drift on my controllers. I was able to turn off walking and just teleport but now I keep turning constantly, if possible can you make a setting so turning can be switch off? Other than that this game is amazing
review_3: The game and concept are very pleasing. Adjusting and accepting the game as is makes it fun. Although there aren't many survival games, this is fulfilling. Aside from my review, I really want a game like The Long Dark to come into VR very much.
